name: Volleyball
description: Volleyball is one of the fastest team games around, and this NES classic recreates the speedy sport in a way that anyone can play. Start by selecting a team for a fast-paced practice round, and then take on the world at the international level. Attacks, lobs or daring dives are all at your disposal, whether playing solo or against a human opponent. With eight male or female teams to choose from, and furiously paced action, Volleyball is perfect for armchair supporters everywhere! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.
